arts.ttl: Anderlecht hold talks with former Watford head coach after Mark van Bommel turned the side down
arts.sum: HLN are reporting that Mark van Bommel has turned down the opportunity to return to management in Belgium with Anderlecht. The man who won the double for Antwerp just a…

arts.ttl: Former Celtic Director of Football Fergal Harkin on why he decided to stick with Standard Liege this summer
arts.sum: Not many in Fergal Harkin’s shoes would have wanted to remain in their job this summer. The Standard Liege Director of Football was faced with an almost impossible task of…
